text: Nena: “oh Ambuye! Mwini Ufumu! Inu mumamupatsa ufumu aliyense amene mwamufuna ndipo mumalanda ufumu wa aliyense amene mwamufuna. Inu mumalemekeza aliyense amene mwamufuna ndi kumpeputsa aliyense amene mwamufuna. M’manja mwanu muli ubwino wonse. Ndithudi Inu muli ndi mphamvu pa chinthu china chilichonse.”
